mapper.insert: insert into recordbooks_column(bookcolumnno,bookno) values(#{columnNo},(select bookno from recordBooks where booknm=#{bookNm}))
mapper.select: select * from recordbooks_column where bookno=(select bookno from recordBooks where booknm=#{bookNm}) order by select * from recordbooks_column order by split_part(bookcolumnno,'-',1)::numeric asc,split_part(bookcolumnno,'-',2)::numeric asc ,split_part(bookcolumnno,'-',3)::numeric asc
